text: Mɨhiŋ 12.14-20 CV 23.15, 34.18, Wkp 23.6-8, Nam 28.17-25, Lo 16.3-8 hekɨlɨ nana viaŋ Isɨlaelɨ hɨdɨlɨ naludɨ valɨlɨŋ huaci hɨnibalaŋ agasaŋ hɨji lamalama iadɨ ibi mɨŋaiahaiaha sɨmɨŋ hekɨlɨ hɨlanɨhalaŋ uami. Hulaŋ iamɨgali mufɨli mufɨli iahavɨbali agɨlaŋ avi hualɨ pabiŋ pabiŋ hɨvɨ mɨhiŋ hekɨlɨ agadɨ hɨvɨ hameŋ laci hameŋ laci lɨhavɨbali uami.
